br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization

Interface JSONSerialization

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NoRootSerialization, Serialization, View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GsonJSONSerialization

    public interface JSONSerialization
extends Serialization
    Basic json serialization support using a Json SerializerBuilder.
    Version:
    3.0.2
    Author:
    Lucas Cavalcanti

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ENVIRONMENT_INDENTED_KEY
      Key used to search via environment if JSON will be printed with indentation or not.

    • Field Detail

      • ENVIRONMENT_INDENTED_KEY

        static final String ENVIRONMENT_INDENTED_KEY
        Key used to search via environment if JSON will be printed with indentation or not. Indentation via code have more priority than via properties.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • withoutRoot

        <T> NoRootSerialization withoutRoot()
        Exclude the root alias from serialization.
        Since:
        3.1.2

        JSONSerialization indented()
